alert.note: Alert for Gasconade (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 15 at 1:23PM CDT until May 15 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN CRAWFORD...SOUTHWESTERN FRANKLIN AND SOUTHEASTERN GASCONADE COUNTIES... At 123 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northwest of Bourbon, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Sullivan, Bourbon, St. Cloud, Japan, Stanton and Oak Hill. This also includes Meramec State Park. This includes Interstate 44 in Missouri between exits 218 and 230. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
